scripts.info: IMPORTANT NOTE: Please make sure to replace any harcoded values like region, AWS account ID, etc.
scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.NetworkApp" -c environmentName=staging -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.NetworkApp" -c environmentName=staging -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --force --require-approval never
scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test --force --require-approval never
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/spokeman152/aws-test:lastest -c environmentName=staging -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --require-approval never
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/spokeman152/aws-test:lastest -c environmentName=staging -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --force --require-approval never
